title: Week 3 Picks Against the Spread, Best Bets, Gambling Advice (Football 9/20)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Pete Prisco and R.J. for Week 3 gambling advice. The guys cover all 15 games on Sunday and Monday, including some historically big spreads. Listen to Will, Pete and R.J. break down trends and issue their picks and best bets of the week. 
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
